name: Retsuki's Self-Care Adventure!
description:
Retsuki is tired from online classes brought about by the pandemic. He needs to practice self-care from the comforts of home. Help him find objects in his house that can help him practice self-care!

This was a small project I made for school where we're to make anything that shows what self-care is to us. So I decided to make a game and thought up five actions that I consider self-care for myself.
